content:
The task is to find an object in the category 'chair' with the shortest path possible. Looking at the neighbors of the current room, 'room_4', there is an object of class 'chair' present in the same room. This object is 'object_13'. Since the object is in the same room, it would be the shortest path to reach the object. Therefore, the next place to go would be 'object_13'.

{'choice': 'object_13'}
